algorithm: The new algorithm assigns scores to the bins based on the square root of the remaining capacity divided by the item size, multiplied by the exponential of the maximum remaining capacity divided by the item size, and the logarithm of the sum as an additional factor.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item, bins):
    max_capacity = np.max(bins)
    remaining_capacity = max_capacity - bins

    scores = np.log((remaining_capacity / item) * np.exp(max_capacity / item) + np.sum(remaining_capacity / item))

    return scores
